error.name: MAX_EMAIL_ADDRESSES_EXCEEDED
error.output: \r\nError: Maximum number of Email Addresses are configured.

error.name: INVALID_SEVERITY_LEVEL_URGENT
error.output: \r\nInvalid severity value. Urgent severity must be less than or equal to non urgent severity.

error.name: INVALID_SEVERITY_LEVEL_NON_URGENT
error.output: \r\nInvalid severity value. Non urgent severity must be greater than or equal to urgent severity.

error.name: MAX_MAIL_SERVERS_EXCEEDED
error.output: \r\nError: Maximum number of Mail Servers are configured.
